Detailed Description

A timer object similar to boost::timer but measures total elapsed time instead of CPU time.

This class measures wall clock rather than CPU time. Make your environment clean because other processes can occupy the CPU, and the time is still counted.

If CPU time measurement is intended, please use boost::timer in file "boost/timer.hpp"
